name: Sapce Snake
description:
Use your mouse to control the spaceship. Click to fire! 

INFO

You control an upgradable spaceship. Your objective is to get as far away from the base as possible. Collect powerups to change and upgrade your weapon shooting patterns. When you encounter an upgrade station, you can trade your powerups to get a permanent weapon upgrade.

DEVS

Art: Ata Dogan and Ashwin Kamath

Programming: Ata Dogan, Ashwin Kamath, Tianyao Liu, Gabriel Duarte
